channel.title: MAC/Terminal on 梦还在吗
channel.description: Recent content in MAC/Terminal on 梦还在吗

item.title: Homebrew更换源
item.description: Homebrew更换源 1. 修改源镜像 鄙人用的是清华大学镜像站 1.1 替换 git -C "$(brew --repo)" remote set-url origin https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/git/homebrew/brew.git git -C "$(brew --repo homebrew/core)" remote set-url origin https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/git/homebrew/homebrew-core.git git -C "$(brew --repo homebrew/cask)" remote set-url origin https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/git/homebrew/homebrew-cask.git brew update 复制代码 1.2 还原（如果还是喜欢 github 更新的话） git -C "$(brew --repo)" remote set-url origin https://github.com/Homebrew/brew.git git -C "$(brew --repo homebrew/core)" remote set-url origin https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core.git git -C "$(brew --repo homebrew/cask)" remote set-url origin https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask.git brew update 复制代码 2. 修改bottles 打开你正在使用的shell配置文件，例如：.
